feed.title: Someone put a virus signature into the blockchain

entry.title: Someone put a virus signature into the blockchain
entry.summary: On May 16, 2014, David Shares posted on the Bitcoin developers' mailing list regarding a Reddit post about a virus signature in the Bitcoin blockchain. He shared a link to the relevant Github issue, highlighting the issue if it hadn't been seen by the group yet. The email included an ad for cross-browser testing, but the main topic was the possible presence of a virus signature.
